definition: Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon/Barry (name)/Gareth Barry (1981-), English footballer
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon

sentences.english: How do you recite the second refuge in Pali?
sentences.chinese: 三皈依的第二条，在巴利文如何表示？

sentences.english: Balian and his father appear to be agnostics.
sentences.chinese: 巴利安和他父亲看起来像不可知论者。

sentences.english: Second, what few people know is that flu itself is far more likely to cause Guillain-Barré than any flu vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 其次，流感本身比疫苗更容易引起巴利综合症。

sentences.english: How do you recite the first refuge in Pali?
sentences.chinese: 三皈依的第一条，在巴利文如何拼读？

sentences.english: Beginning with your barre work, remember always to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 从您的巴利工作，始终记得呼吸。

sentences.english: He saw Paris' body drenched in blood.
sentences.chinese: 他看到巴利斯的尸体躺在血泊中。

sentences.english: What is the meaning of those Pali words?
sentences.chinese: 这些巴利文的意思是什么？

sentences.english: Among them, the Pali version is the oldest in respect of language and contents.
sentences.chinese: 其中，巴利文的版本在语言和内容方面是最古老的。

sentences.english: She had asked Ser Barristan that question the afternoon the hostages went forth.
sentences.chinese: 送走人质当天下午她曾问过巴利斯坦爵士。

sentences.english: Michael Finley, Brent Barry, and Kurt Thomas can be depended upon as well.
sentences.chinese: 当然芬利，托马斯巴利同样值得依赖。

sentences.english: A Pali grammar was published in 1826 by Burnouf and Lassen.
sentences.chinese: 伯讷夫和拉森在1826年出版了《巴利语语法》。

sentences.english: Lincoln and Bellick go to the water station to cut off the main conduit water.
sentences.chinese: 林肯和巴利克来到了水站，断开了主输水管道的供水。

sentences.english: "We hate each other cordially, " says the liberal Mr Balis.
sentences.chinese: 而自由主义者巴利斯说，“我们热诚的相互恨对方。”

sentences.english: Mr. Barrios is a historian, an anthropologist and investigator.
sentences.chinese: 巴利欧斯先生是一位历史学家，人类学家和研究者。

sentences.english: What is the Pali word for the whole Teaching of the Buddha?
sentences.chinese: 佛陀所传授的一切法，巴利文的名称是什么？

definition: woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
Barth or Barthes (name)/Roland Barthes (1915-1980), French critic and semiotician
Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
